title: Devil's food birthday cake
ingredients: ['50g cocoa powder', '100g dark muscovado sugar', '250ml boiling water', '125g soft unsalted butter', '150g caster sugar', '225g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '2 eggs', '125ml boiling water', '30g dark muscovado sugar', '175g cubed unsalted butter', '300g dark chocolate']
